footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming ceremonies and find the one that resonates with you.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Relive the magic of our past gatherings.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral medicine from the Amazon jungle, prepared by mixing two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Known as the “vine of the soul,” this sacred brew has been used for centuries in shamanic rituals for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing, and to expand consciousness.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on a biochemical and spiritual level. It contains DMT, a compound that opens the doors to a deeper perception of reality, allowing for introspection, trauma release, and a connection with the subconscious. Each experience is unique, guided by the wisdom of the plant and the participant's intention.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master teacher that instructs through visions, emotions, and revelations. It is not a recreational drug, but a sacred tool that demands respect, preparation, and a clear purpose. Its guidance can reveal limiting patterns, heal past wounds, and offer a new perspective on life and the universe.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Release mental blocks, reduce anxiety, and find answers to deep questions about your life and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Confront and process traumas, fears, and ingrained emotional patterns in a safe and supportive environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a sense of unity with the universe, nature, and your true self, expanding your consciousness.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies are a powerful shared healing experience. The group's energy creates a supportive field where each participant contributes to the healing of others. It is a space to connect, share, and grow together, guided by our experienced facilitators.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies. This format allows for a deep focus on your specific intentions, with the exclusive attention of our guides. It is ideal for intensive inner work, couples, or small groups of friends.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated team that will hold and guide your healing journey.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. Changes will be reflected across the site.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide from the database.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and stay connected. Follow us on our social media for updates on ceremonies, inspirational content, and to be part of this healing family.

adminPanelSubtitle: Manage and supervise the application from here.
backupSubtitle: Perform backups and restore application data.
exportDataDescription: Download a backup of all major database collections (users, ceremonies, guides, content) into a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Upload a JSON file to restore the application's data. This action will overwrite existing data.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been restored from the file.
importWarningTitle: Warning! You are about to overwrite data.
importWarningDescription: This action will replace the current data with the content of the backup file. An automatic backup will be created before import in case you need to roll back the changes.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can use it to revert the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningTitle: Are you sure you want to roll back?
rollbackWarningDescription: This action will restore the database to the state it was in before the last import. This action cannot be undone.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to its previous state.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review the conversations users have had with the chatbot.
allConversationsDescription: Explore the chat history to understand user needs.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review system errors to diagnose problems.
systemLogsDescription: List of errors automatically captured by the system.
deleteAllLogsConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete all logs?
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All error logs will be permanently deleted.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete this error log.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
featureComingSoon: Feature in development! Check back soon.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I'm here to help you on your healing journey. How can I guide you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.

mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the past events section.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony will now appear under 'Past Events'.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from public view but not deleted.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counters for this ceremony to zero.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan for up to 2 people.
authRequiredDescription: Please sign in to view the ceremony details.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: To access this section and continue your preparation, please sign in or create an account. It's the first step towards your transformation.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To explore all our ceremonies and reserve your spot, please sign in or create an account.
authRequiredCoursesDescription: To access the preparation materials, please sign in or create an account.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced facilitators who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Discover how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is key to a profound and safe experience. Follow these recommendations to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: From preparation to integration, each step is a vital part of your healing journey.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space for introspection, release, and deep connection, guided by icaros and the group's energy.
experienceProcessDescription: Visions, emotions, and revelations. Each journey is unique, a dance between your being and the plant's wisdom.
integrationProcessDescription: The real work begins afterward. We support you in incorporating the teachings into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet helps purify the body, allowing the medicine to work more clearly. We recommend following it for at least 3-5 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa)
• Legumes and lentils
• Grilled chicken or fish
• Plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Spicy or heavily seasoned food
• Dairy and fermented foods
• Refined sugars and caffeine
• Alcohol and recreational drugs
mentalPrepSubtitle: Intention is the map for your journey. Cultivate an open mind and a receptive heart.
meditationDescription: Spend time meditating and in silence. Calming the mind prepares you to receive the medicine's messages.
intentionsDescription: What are you seeking to heal? What do you want to understand? Write down your intentions to give clear direction to your experience.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to note your thoughts and emotions before and after the ceremony. It is a powerful tool for integration.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions and forgotten memories to the surface. This is a necessary emotional purge for healing. Trust the process, allow yourself to feel without judgment, and know that you are in a safe and contained space to release what no longer serves you. Our guides are there to support you every moment.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Yoga mat or mattress
• Blanket and pillow
• Water bottle
essentialsList:
• Personal item for the altar (optional)
• Journal and pen
• Open mind and heart

pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step before continuing.
